amendment.description: Amendment directs the Secretary to dedicate no less than 1.5 percent of funds in the bill to increase recreational public access to existing lands for hunting, fishing, or other recreational purposes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 111-582 to require that no less than 1.5 percent of the Land and Water Conservation Fund each year go toward securing recreational public access to Federal Lands under the jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior for hunting, fishing, and other outdoor recreation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 404 - 1 (Roll no. 508).
